Class MainGame

java.lang.Object
com.aldrich.MainGame
public class MainGame extends Object
This is a simple Lucky 9 game with betting feature.

    • revealPlayerHand

      private static void revealPlayerHand()

    • revealTotalPoints

      private static void revealTotalPoints​(boolean bool)
      This method reveals the total points of either the player and the dealer.
      Parameters:
      bool - switch to either calculate the points of the player or the dealer.

    • choiceToHit

      private static void choiceToHit​(int totalPoints)
      This method gives the player the choice to hit or stand.
      Parameters:
      totalPoints - Total points of the player

    • revealDealerHandAndPoints

      private static void revealDealerHandAndPoints​(int dealerMoney)
      This method reveals the current hand and the total points of the dealer.
      Parameters:
      dealerMoney - Current money of the dealer.

    • result

      private static String result​(int playerPoints, int dealerPoints, int bet, int playerMoney, int dealerMoney)
      This method checks if the player won and returns "win", "lose", or "draw".
      Parameters:
      playerPoints - Total points of the player.
      dealerPoints - Total points of the dealer.
      bet - Current bet.
      playerMoney - Current money of the player.
      dealerMoney - Current money of the dealer.
      Returns:
      "win" if total points of the player is greater than the total points of the dealer; "lose" if total points of dealer is greater than the total points of the player; and "draw" if player and dealer has equal total points.

    • gainOrLoss

      private static int[] gainOrLoss​(int playerMoney, int dealerMoney, int bet, String winLoseDraw)
      This method either adds or subtracts money from the player and dealer and returns an array of the player's and dealer's money.
      Parameters:
      playerMoney - int value of current money of the player.
      dealerMoney - int value of urrent money of the dealer.
      bet - int value of current bet.
      winLoseDraw - string value of either "win", "lose", or "draw".
      Returns:
      an array where array[0] is the player's money and array[1] is the dealer's money.

    • getBet

      private static int getBet​(int playerMoney, int dealerMoney)
      This method gets int bet from the player.
      Parameters:
      playerMoney - int value of current money of the player.
      dealerMoney - int value of current money of the dealer.
      Returns:
      int value of bet

    • revealStatistics

      private static void revealStatistics​(int currentLargestBet, int playerBet, int totalRounds, int roundsWon, int roundsLost, int playerMoney)
      This method reveals the statistics after the game ends.
      Parameters:
      currentLargestBet - int value of current largest bet.
      playerBet - int value of the bet from the player.
      totalRounds - int value of the number of the total rounds.
      roundsWon - int value of the number of the rounds won.
      roundsLost - int value of the number of the rounds lost.
      playerMoney - int value of the current money of the player
